title: Best friends drama… Pretty Basic tells all
description:
This week on Fool Coverage, Laura and Manny invite the hosts of the Pretty Basic podcast, Alisha Marie and Remi Cruz! They talk about the differences and evolution of YouTubers and TikTokers, what they wish they would've known when starting off, how to have a healthy and strong friendship, and more!

Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733

Pretty Basic Podcast:
• Audio: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/pretty-basic-with-alisha-marie-and-remi-cruz/id1439655378
• Video: https://www.youtube.com/c/prettybasicpodcast

Follow Alisha Marie on IG: @alisha
Follow Remi Cruz on IG: @missremiashten

More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg

Thanks to our sponsors:
• Go to Vegamour.com/fool and use code FOOL to save 20 percent on your first order!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
